title: Crocodile Tears
description: Jay thinks Christine oversells her injuries and points out a particular phone call he got from the super producer as proof. Justin Silver and Ryan Long call in from their heterosexual weekend getaway. Dan and Jay discuss how hard it must be to be a bouncer at a club.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
